ing: 2 tablespoons cold butter, cut into pieces
des: "This recipe makes a tasty, not overly sweet or starchy, blueberry pie filling."
ins: Cook and stir 3 pints blueberries, sugar, cornstarch, and cinnamon in a saucepan with water over medium-low heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture is slightly thickened, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and add butter and remaining 1 pint blueberries; stir gently so blueberries stay whole. Allow to cool.
